delete.description:
1. Admins of the team can edit any other member of the team
    2. Non-admins can edit themselves

post.description:
Check the credentials and login if credentials are valid and authenticated.
    Calls Django Auth login method to register User ID in Django session framework.

    Accept the following POST parameters: username, password

Calls Django logout method and logs out current User object.

    Accepts/Returns nothing.

Calls Django Auth SetPasswordForm save method.

    Accepts the following POST parameters: new_password1, new_password2
    Returns the success/fail message.

for creating, we want: level, user_id
    for response, we want: id, user data, team
    We want id, user object, and team data response
    need to use to_representation or form_represenation

time.description: The time duration to make the Recipe.

servings.description: The number of servings the Recipe yields.

position.description: The position of the Ingredient in the Recipe.

optional.description: Whether the Ingredient is optional for the Recipe.

recentSchedules.description: The ScheduledRecipes of the Recipe in the past 3 weeks, and the next 3 weeks.

timelineItems.description: The Notes and TimelineEvents of the Recipe.

modified.description: The last modified time of the Recipe fields.

created.description: The creation time of the Recipe.

user_favorite.description: Whether the User has favorited the Recipe.

backgroundUrl.description: The background URL of the Upload for progressive loading.

contentType.description: The content type of the Upload.

author.description: Name of User who created the Upload.

primaryImage.description: The primary image of the Recipe.

versions.description: The previous versions of the Recipe.
